description: This source file contains functions to seed initial data into a database, specifically for regions and categories. It uses SQLAlchemy ORM for database interactions and defines utility functions for inserting default values if they do not already exist.

methods.name: int seed_regions(db: Session, regions: Iterable[tuple[str, str]] | None = None)
methods.description: Seeds default region records into the database if they do not already exist.

methods.name: int seed_categories(db: Session, categories: Iterable[tuple[str, str | None]] | None = None)
methods.description: Seeds default category records into the database if they do not already exist.

ctags.name: seed_categories
ctags.pattern: /^def seed_categories(db: Session, categories: Iterable[tuple[str, str | None]] | None = None) -> /
ctags.signature: (db: Session, categories: Iterable[tuple[str, str | None]] | None = None)

ctags.name: seed_regions
ctags.pattern: /^def seed_regions(db: Session, regions: Iterable[tuple[str, str]] | None = None) -> int:$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, regions: Iterable[tuple[str, str]] | None = None)
